Secondly, the study proposed three waveband selection algorithms based on neighborhood rough set (NRS) theory. These algorithms identified the optimal waveband subsets with the highest distinguishing ability, addressing the challenge of high-dimensional HSI data. This suggests that HSI technology can effectively select the most relevant wavebands for classification, enhancing the interpretability of the models.
